channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
Why isn't something like this thread amplified in the form of a commercial that runs on CNN, MSNBC and Fox every night until Congress acts? When are we going to organize some of the energy here or are we all just going to be screaming in pain at each other. https://t.co/tudbSI8Ge3
Also, to the tech industry - why can't we help the doctor do a more effective form of presentation than this crappy thread structure?
@jack is busy inventing ponzi schemes to increase his net worth of billions by a few points every year.
Why not do something good w your money?
Scientists blast out Earthâ€™s location with the hope of reaching aliens. https://t.co/s3F4Qolrsr
